name: Koren, Appellant, v. United Steelworkers of America
name_abbreviation: Koren v. United Steelworkers of America

judges: Before Bell, 0. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.

parties: Koren, Appellant, v. United Steelworkers of America.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Judgment affirmed.
Mr. Justice Musmanno did not participate in the decision of this case.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Herbert B. Lebovitg, with him Lebovitg & Lebovitg, for appellant.

casebody.head_matter:
Koren, Appellant, v. United Steelworkers of America.
Argued October 7, 1968.
Before Bell, 0. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
Herbert B. Lebovitg, with him Lebovitg & Lebovitg, for appellant.
Morton B. DeBroff, with him Leo I. Shapiro, for appellee.
November 12, 1968:
